data.title: Alkaloid production and response to natural adverse conditions in Peganum harmala: in silico transcriptome analyses
data.meta_description: Peganum harmala is a valuable wild plant that grows and survives under adverse conditions and produces pharmaceutical alkaloid metabolites. Using different assemblers to develop a transcriptome improves the quality of assembled transcriptome. In this study, a concrete and accurate method for …
